column1: At first this seems like other SPF moisturizers - my previous buys have been based on which brand is on sale because they all seem similar. I live at high altitude and having aging skin, so I never leave the house without sunscreen. However, this product makes my skin look better - it seems to have a way of reflecting light that makes wrinkles and discolorations (aka "age spots") less noticeable. I have actually received compliments about my skin.
I Would love to try this product because it helps with my really bad sunburns [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved Olay Luminous Brightening and Protecting Lotion SPF 30 from my daughter as a gift and I loved it! Easy to apply, made my skin look and feel great. Olay Luminous Brightening and Protecting Lotion SPF 30 also had a very pleasant smell. I would definitively recommend!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Other broad spectrum SPF face creams I have tried have been heavy and feel a bit uncomfortable on my skin,but this cream is light and leaves no heavy feel. I love that! And it does the job of protecting my skin from the sun. I have worn it at the beach, and when out for day trips, and just for everyday. There is never any sign of the sun affecting my face. I also really think that it does make my skin look brighter. This is definitely my new go to product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is good to apply prior to makeup application. It's not too heavy and not too thin. It does add a luminous glow to the skin. I have a few dark spots on my forehead that seem to be fading since using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. Don't know that I can afford to actually purchase it but I love it. Face is soft and clear and skin is protected and supple. I would recommend this to any one that can afford to buy it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I bought this to lighten some dark spots on my fave. I have been using it and havent noticed the slightest change. Not going to buy again.

I tried this in the past, but did not continue using it. I tried it again recently and it reminded me that this product works. My skin tone became more even. Olay, it would be much appreciated if you can make a fragrance free version of this as well as oxybenzone free for those of us who are sensitive. I feel like I am spreading perfume on my face, and the smell lingers throughout the day, so as much as I like this product, sadly I do not know if I can use it long term.

I tried this not sure what to expect, was very pleased with how much smoother and lighter under my eyes look. I typically use a concealer over it but even If I don't have time I don't see the darkness under the eye as much as before [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have no idea what is supposed to happen. It's small for the price (this is not a criticism on Walmart per se, probably the MSRP). Ya not buy again because for that price I buy a name brand at Macy's.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
